title: [BUG] SKXamlCanvas doesn't draw anything on iOS simulator
body:
**Description**

I created a custom SkXamlCanvas in an UNO platform project. 
On my Android phone the canvas works fine, but on my iOS emulator nothing is drawn to the screen. (It remains in its blue state, as defined in XAML)

**Code**
```
public void Render(SKCanvas canvas, float angleInRadians, SKPoint center, float scale, params object[] parameters)
        {
            var Image = (SKImage) parameters[0];

            canvas.Clear(SKColors.White);

            canvas.DrawImage(Image, 0, 0);

            var ItemsSource = (IEnumerable<Program.Point>)parameters[1];

            if (ItemsSource == null) return;

            if (!ItemsSource.Any()) return;

            SKPaint strokePoint = new SKPaint()
            {
                Color = SKColors.Black,
                IsAntialias = true,
                Style = SKPaintStyle.Stroke,
                StrokeWidth = 5
            };

            foreach (var point in ItemsSource)
            {
                if (point == null)
                {
                    continue;
                }

                var coord = new SKPoint(point.X, point.Y);
                SKPath path = new SKPath();

                path.MoveTo(new SKPoint(coord.X - 25, coord.Y));
                path.LineTo(new SKPoint(coord.X + 25, coord.Y));

                path.MoveTo(new SKPoint(coord.X, coord.Y + 50));
                path.LineTo(new SKPoint(coord.X, coord.Y - 50));

                canvas.DrawPath(path, strokePoint);

                //ItemsBounds.Add(path.Bounds);

                path.Dispose();
            }

            strokePoint.Dispose();

            canvas.Flush();
        }
```

**Expected Behavior**

Draw an image and some paths from a set of coordinates.

**Actual Behavior**

Nothing is drawn on the canvas, it remains blue as set in xaml.
```
<Grid>
    <local_controls:MarkerCanvas Name="MainCanvas" PlaceMarker="{Binding PlaceMarker}" Visibility="Visible" 
IgnorePixelScaling="True" ItemsSource="{Binding Points}" Background="Blue"/>
  </Grid>
```

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue: 2.88.0-preview.209
- Last known good version:  unkown
- IDE:  Visual Studio
- Platform Target Frameworks: <!-- all that apply, remove the platforms that aren't broken or haven't had any testing -->
  - iOS:  15.2

- Target Devices: 
  - iPhone 13 (Simulator)
